verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] leave the annual Group of Seven meeting early , heading to Singapore to prepare for the North Korean summit .
[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: leave] [ARG1: the annual Group of Seven meeting] [ARGM-TMP: early] , [ARGM-PRD: heading to Singapore to prepare for the North Korean summit] .
[ARG0: President Trump] will leave the annual Group of Seven meeting early , [V: heading] [ARG1: to Singapore] [ARGM-PRP: to prepare for the North Korean summit] .
[ARG0: President Trump] will leave the annual Group of Seven meeting early , heading to Singapore to [V: prepare] [ARG2: for the North Korean summit] .
